content:
if the Stony Brook football team  is going to bounce back from its  loss against William  Mary from last weekend it will not be easy PERIOD

After entering the Colonial Athletic Association in  the Seawolves had their worst season in terms of record since  PERIOD Tough matchups and injuries made the transition all the more difficult PERIOD
